name: cribbage-trainer
description: Two-player cribbage discard and play improvement tool.

scripts.lint: eslint --max-warnings 0 . && stylelint '**/*.css' && markdownlint README.md && prettier --check . && cspell '**' --gitignore && tsc && jscpd && better-npm-audit audit && (check-outdated || true)
scripts.test-storybook: storybook build && npx --no-install concurrently --kill-others --success first --names 'Storybook,Test' 'npx --no-install http-server storybook-static --port 6006 --silent > /dev/null 2>&1 | tail -f /dev/null' 'npx --no-install wait-on --timeout 1s tcp:6006 && test-storybook --browsers chromium webkit firefox'
scripts.docker-test-e2e: docker build -t cribbage-trainer-test-e2e . && docker run --rm --volume ${PWD}/playwright-report:/usr/src/app/playwright-report --volume ${PWD}/test-results:/usr/src/app/test-results --volume ${PWD}/tests-e2e/index.screenshots.spec.ts-snapshots:/usr/src/app/tests-e2e/index.screenshots.spec.ts-snapshots cribbage-trainer-test-e2e
scripts.clean: rimraf .VSCodeCounter/ coverage/ dist/ playwright-report/ storybook-static/ test-results/ tsconfig.tsbuildinfo

author: Mark A. Fitzgerald <mark.a.fitzgerald1@gmail.com>
